snippet: Alarmed by what they view as the governor's attempts to politicize City University of New York, the City Council's Black, Latino and Asian Caucus is urging the university's board of trustees to give the school's chancellor, James B. Milliken, a vo...
lead_paragraph: Alarmed by what they view as the governor's attempts to politicize City University of New York, the City Council's Black, Latino and Asian Caucus is urging the university's board of trustees to give the school's chancellor, James B. Milliken, a vote of confidence.

headline.main: City Council Caucus’s Letter to CUNY
